contents.text: Thank you for calling Zinc in San Francisco, where communication is the answer.
If you are an existing customer reporting an issue, please press 1.
All our technical specialists are currently assisting other callers. Please hold the line and we will connect you as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a connectivity issue affecting my Zinc account
Troubleshoot my push-to-talk feature on the Zinc mobile app—it’s not connecting correctly.
I need to debug packet loss on my corporate SIP trunk and escalate my existing support ticket.
I need help resetting my home broadband modem because the internet keeps dropping.
I’m an existing Zinc customer and my remote lab connection keeps disconnecting – I need technical assistance.

contents.text: If you have a billing question, please press 2.
Our billing department is experiencing high call volumes. Please stay on the line for the next available representative.

navigationGoals: Clarify unexpected charges on my most recent Zinc invoice
Ask about applying a veteran discount or credit to my monthly service bill.
I want a breakdown of the bandwidth surcharge on my latest invoice and clarification on the billing line items.
I have a question about a surcharge on my latest phone bill and would like to dispute it.
I’m calling to clarify unexpected charges on my recent Zinc invoice for my lab’s internet plan.

contents.text: For Sales and New Service Inquiries, please press 2.
For Pricing Information and Quotes, please press 1.
A sales representative will be with you shortly. Thank you for choosing Zinc.

navigationGoals: Obtain a quote for adding 50 additional user licenses
Get a price quote for adding voice and messaging services for a small veteran support team.
I’m requesting a quote for a scalable enterprise VoIP trunking solution for a new deployment.
I’d like a quote for upgrading my internet plan so I can stream video more reliably.
I’d like to get pricing and a quote for high-bandwidth internet for my physics research lab.

contents.text: For Partnership or Media Inquiries, please press 2.
Our partnership team is reviewing messages in the order received. Please hold for the next available agent.

navigationGoals: Explore partnership opportunities to integrate Zinc into our platform
Speak with someone about a partnership between Zinc and my veteran mentoring nonprofit.
I’d like to discuss integrating Zinc’s communications API as part of a strategic partnership.
I want to discuss partnering Zinc services with my local senior center to offer discounted rates.
I’m organizing a student-run physics symposium and would like to discuss a partnership or sponsorship opportunity.
